author: Koch, Christian Gottlieb, -1736
title: Apokatasaseos Act. III. 21. solida & orthodoxa expositio S. Scriptura corroborata, patrum itidem, & theologorum testimoniis confirmata fanaticis nostri temporis, & qui illis adstipulantur, imprimis verò, Dn. Petro Poireto, & Evangelii æterni auctori, M. D
